name: Pixel Hole
description:
Hey Everyone! We're Virtual Dwellers, and this is our first small title: Pixel Hole!

We started developing Pixel Hole for a class project, and since we liked the result, we decided to release it to the public to try and get a little bit of feedback!

We obviously took reference in Downwell, game by Devolver Digital!

The game is in an early development state, and it is stopped until we finish our newest project, which you can check out in our Website: virtualdwellers.com
